name: Q&T S.p.A.
goal: Q&T is an Italian engineering Company with an over 30-year experience in the field of development cooperation. The Company works in emerging and developing economies through funds provided for by the European Union, the World Bank, UNDP and all major regional banks, including EBRD, ADB, AfDB, and major development agency.
interests: Development, Education, Energy, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Development Cooperation, in the fields of modernization of public health facilities, supply of software systems and hardware equipment for the public administration, vocational training programs, advanced environmental and renewable energy technologies, engineering and supply of equipment for the agribusiness industry.
